title: The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Zero Shot Learning

media:group.media:title: The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Zero Shot Learning
media:group.media:description:

Video with transcript included:  https://bit.ly/3e3Lt6i   

Roland Meertens shows how one can get started deploying models without requiring any data, discussing foundational models, and examples of them, such as GPT-3 and OpenAI CLIP.

This presentation was recorded at QCon Plus November 2021: https://plus.qconferences.com/ 

#ArtificialIntelligence #Deployment #CloudComputing
